As I live and breathe. The Wolverine. And he's a junkie now.

She took something of mine. Something for which I am responsible. When I wasn't looking. Mexican lady. Long hair, long legs, Long gone. Has her sights on you. (off Logan's glare) No bells?

Pierce just smiles, unfazed, then shifts his gaze to Loga bag of pills. Peering in, quasi-conspiratorial:

The new Quesalupa from Taco Bell. Get it with chicken, get it with steak. But with cheese baked right in the shell it's the next big--

Logan, pushing through the pain, pulls out the syringe an INJECTS Charles. The medication immediately takes effect, subduing the wave.
Caliban is released as well, gulping for air.
Charles lies still, staring up at Logan who shakes off th effects of the wave, the ringing fading. He reaches down picks up the disoriented old man--

How `bout you blow on them to make them safe.

Fuck off, Logan.
So you know who I am now.

Take the pills.

They want your help, not mine. (off Logan's look) Oh, yes. That's how fucking stupid they are. They're waiting for you. At the Statue of Liberty.

When I found you, you were pursuing a career as a "cage fighter".

A warm capper to life as an assassin, hooked on barbiturates. (smiles, dark) You were an animal, but we took you in. I gave you a family.
